common.name: Name
common.defaultRequiredFields: Please fill in mandatory fields marked with '*'
common.unauthorizedMessage: You are not authorized to view this page.
common.serviceDisabledMessage: This service has not been enabled by your Admin. Please contact your DataPlane Administrator to enable it.
common.serviceUnavailableMessage: This service is unavailable. Please contact your DataPlane Administrator to install/enable it.
common.invalidUser: You are not an authorized DataPlane user. Please contact your DataPlane Administrator.

description.trackingMessage: Hortonworks DataPlane Service uses cookies and other telemetry mechanisms to improve the product and your experience. By logging in, you give consent to Hortonworks to use cookies. To learn more, please review our
description.invalidCredentials: Credentials were incorrect. Please try again.

labels.defineUsers: Define User Privileges Roles and Groups
labels.manageUsers: Manage User Privileges Roles and Groups

description.dataplane: Welcome to Hortonworks DataPlane Service. To start, please configure the LDAP properties and allow DataPlane authenticate against it. Optionally, you can add DataPlane Administrators. Please proceed by clicking on GET STARTED
description.clusterOnboard: Welcome to Hortonworks DataPlane Service. To start, please add your Ambari managed clusters to DataPlane. You can also enable DataPlane services or provide more users or groups access to them. Please proceed by clicking on GET STARTED.
description.setupAuth: The first step is to help DataPlane connect to your LDAP by providing the LDAP configurations to DataPlane.
description.defineUsers: Upon completing the LDAP configuration, you may add administrators to DataPlane. You can add users or groups to DataPlane and assign or modify their roles anytime through the User Management Screen.
description.manageUsers: You can manage users or groups in DataPlane and assign or modify their roles anytime through the User Management Screen.
description.addCluster: Add your existing Ambari-managed cluster to DataPlane. DataPlane will auto-discover cluster information including available cluster services.
description.setService: Set up services to enable DataPlane to manage your data
description.addDataset: Create asset collection using Data Steward Studio capability
description.ldapEditNote: Note: Values for attributes which are disabled must be valid on the LDAP instance if it is being pointed to a new URL.

labels.configError: Unable to save LDAP configuration. Please check and try again.
labels.uploadSecureLDAP: Upload certificate if your LDAP server needs to be accessed securely
labels.editSecureLDAP: Update certificate if your LDAP server needs to be accessed securely

description.configurationDesctiption: The first step is to help DataPlane connect to your LDAP by providing the appropriate configurations.
description.genericCertificateError: We could not save or update the LDAP certificate. Please try again.

description.ldapUserFetchError: Not able to fetch users from LDAP.
description.ldapGroupFetchError: Not able to fetch groups from LDAP

labels.syncFailed: Cluster Information could not be fetched

description.verificationWelcome: Welcome to {{serviceName}} Enablement Wizard. Please begin with verifying your SmartSense ID.
description.manualInstall: Service {{serviceName}} is not enabled on cluster {{clusterName}} as one or more of the dependent services have not been enabled.
description.installOptionalService: Service {{serviceName}} is enabled on cluster {{clusterName}}. However one or more of the optional services have not been enabled.
description.installDependentService: Please enable the dependent services on the cluster using the documentation link.
description.verifyDependency: After all the dependent services are installed on the cluster, please click on the verification check box.
description.verificationPageLoadError: This Service is not installed as a part of DataPlane Services. Go to Services page for more information
description.installationConfirmation: All the dependent services have been installed on cluster {{clusterName}}.
description.installationLink: For detailed steps on the installation process, please visit
description.verifyingStatus: Verifying dependent services status on the cluster...
description.allDependenciesMet: All the service dependencies are met. Please click Next to continue.
description.mandatoryDependenciesMet: All the mandatory service dependencies are met.
description.optionalInstallation: Optionally, you can install the following services to perform additional functions on the cluster.
description.errorStatus: The following dependent service(s) information is not present on the cluster. Please install them to continue.
description.serviceEnabled: All the authorized users of {{serviceName}} service, should re-login to be able to access the service.
description.serviceNotInstalled: {{serviceName}} is not installed as a part DataPlane Services. Please follow this link to know more information on how services can be added to DataPlane Services
description.serviceNotHealthy: {{serviceName}} has been added as a DataPlane Service, but it is not running. You can still enable this service but the users might not be able to access the service. Click OK to continue.

description.validationErrorMessage: Please fill all the fields marked with (*)!
description.fileReadErrorMessage: Error occurred while reading the file!

labels.onlyAllowTrusted: Validate the SSL certificate and only allow trusted connections
labels.onlyAllowTrusted-hint: DataPlane will attempt to confirm that the SSL certificate is valid. If your cluster has been configured with a self-signed certificate, you need to either disable this validation (uncheck this box), or upload the certificate to DataPlane prior to cluster registration (certificate upload is available under Admin > Settings).
labels.behindGateway: Ambari and Cluster Services behind Knox Gateway
labels.behindGateway-hint: If Ambari and your cluster services are configured behind a Knox Gateway, you should check this box. This enables DataPlane to establish connections to the cluster services via the Knox Gateway.

description.ambariUrlHint: Enter URL to connect to Ambari (direct or via Knox Gateway if in use)
description.editCluster: Please update your Ambari managed cluster (already added to DataPlane) here.
description.addCluster: Please add Ambari managed cluster to DataPlane. DataPlane will auto-discover cluster information such as the cluster name, active services & important metrics running.
description.datalake: This cluster has been identified as a Datalake since it has data management services,  {{serviceNames}} running.
description.clusterAddSuccess: Your cluster has been added to DataPlane.
description.duplicateDataCenter: A cluster with the same name already exists in the given data center. Please select a different cluster, or specify a different data center name.
description.connectionFailed: Unable to establish a connection from DataPlane to your cluster. Check the following:

connectionFailureReasons.ambariServerDown: Check if the Ambari server is up and running in the given url
connectionFailureReasons.insufficientAccessRights: Make sure that you have right access rights to the ambari server

description.userManagement: You can manage the users or groups added to DataPlane through User Management. This page is available for the DataPlane Adminsitrator. You can add new users or groups and assign them roles by clicking on ADD USER or ADD GROUP button. To activate/deactivate to edit their roles, click on the username in the list below or click on the menu icon on the displayed rows.
description.additionalConfigs: Please provide these additional configurations required by DataPlane to discover the cluster information
description.knoxUrl: Please enter the URL of the Knox Service on the HDP cluster which is configured to work with DataPlane.
description.ldapError: Not able to fetch users from LDAP
description.addUserError: The following users could not be saved. Please check if they have already been added.
description.addGroupError: The following groups could not be saved. Please check if they have already been added.
description.invalidRoleInput: One or more roles are invalid. You must select a role from the Roles dropdown or dropdown options that appear as you type in the Roles field.
description.invalidAmbariUrl: Invalid Ambari URL. Please enter a valid URL of the form http[s]://hostname[:port][/path].
description.invalidLocation: Not a valid location. Please select a location from dropdown.
description.invalidUserInput: One or more usernames are invalid. You must select a name from the dropdown options that appear as you type in the Usernames field.
description.invalidGroupInput: One or more group names are invalid. You must select a name from the dropdown options that appear as you type in the Group Names field.
description.loadServiceError: Could not fetch Data Plane Services information from Ambari

backenderrors.General: DataPlane could not connect to the Ambari cluster. Information may not be up to date.

description.rolesOverrideWarning: This will override any roles the user acquired as part of groups
description.clusterDeleteWarning: Removing a cluster causes loss of data such as associated pairings, policies and asset collections. Please delete those objects first before deleting a cluster. This action cannot be undone. Please confirm if you want to go ahead.
description.onlyAllowTrusted: Check this option to let DataPlane validate SSL certificates if your cluster is SSL enabled
description.behindGateway: Check this option if Ambari and your cluster services are accessed via a Knox Gateway.
description.ambariBehindKnoxWarning: It appears Ambari and your cluster services are behind a Knox Gateway but you did not check the Knox Gateway option. We will proceed and register this cluster as using a Knox Gateway. Click Proceed to continue.
description.ambariNotBehindKnoxWarning: You checked that your Ambari and cluster services are behind a Knox Gateway but we have determined that is not the case. We will proceed and register this cluster as not using a Knox Gateway. Click Proceed to continue

labels.messageDelete: Are you sure you want to delete asset collection {{datasetName}}?
labels.creator: Creator
labels.name: Name
labels.emptySearchResult: There are no asset collection that match your search.

ds-editor.ds-description: Organize your hive assets into logical groups for subsequent usage.
ds-editor.tagDescription: Add tags to your asset collection for context and subsequent lookup
ds-editor.asset-description: Add related data assets into your asset collection, by searching across this Data-Lake

errors.unique: An asset collection with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

asset-search.noSearchMsg: Please search for assets above or use Advanced Search

asset-list.starAssetmessage: Few assets listed above already belong to asset collection, and cannot be used in any other asset collection

assets.add-assets-desc: Add related data assets into your workspace, by searching across the Data-Lake

errors.noMatch: New password does not match re-entered password.

not_found.link_text: Click here to return to home page.

error.cluster.ambari.status.unreachable-host-e: Host is unreachable. Please check if Ambari is up and reachable from DataPlane host. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.dns-error: Unable to resolve host. Please verify that the DataPlane host can reach the domain specified in the URL and it is configured correctly in your corporate or public DNS.Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.invalid-json-respo: Unable to deserialize JSON. Please verify the exact errors from DataPlane logs.
error.cluster.ambari.status.unexpected-respons: We received an unexpected response from cluster. Please verify the exact errors from DataPlane logs.
Unexpected Response from Ambari, expected 403 or 401. Please verify the exact errors from DataPlane logs.
error.cluster.ambari.status.connection-refused: Connection to remote address was refused. Please check if Ambari is up and reachable from DataPlane host. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.detail.0-clusters-: There are no clusters attached to this Ambari instance. Please check logs for more information.
error.cluster.ambari.status.detail.more-than-1: There are more than one clusters attached to this Ambari instance. Please check logs for more information.
error.cluster.ambari.status.detail.access-deta: User does not have required rights to access this cluster. Please ask your Ambari administrator to grant required rights.
error.cluster.ambari.status.detail.missing-dat: Unknown error: One of Knox URL or Token is unavailable.. Please check logs for more information.
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.public-key-co: We were unable to authenticate the logged-in user with Knox on HDP cluster. Please verify that trust between Knox and DataPlane has been setup correctly. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.ranger-rights: User does not have required rights to access Knox on this HDP cluster. Please ensure that logged-in user has required privileges granted. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.configuration: Knox has not been setup for DataPlane correctly. Please verify Knox gateway logs on HDP cluster for more information. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.public-key-co: We were unable to authenticate the logged-in user with Knox on HDP cluster. Please verify Knox gateway logs on HDP cluster for more information. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.connection-re: Connection to remote address was refused. Please check if Knox is up and reachable from DataPlane host. <a href='https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/DPS1/DPS-1.0.0/bk_dps-installation/content/troubleshooting_dps_installation.html#d6e1946' target="_blank">
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.jwt-token-mis: This operation is not supported for non-LDAP users. Please log-in as an LDAP user to add this cluster.
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.tls-error: TLS error. Please ensure your Knox server has been configured with a correct keystore. If you are using self-signed certificates, you would need to get it added to Dataplane truststore.
error.cluster.ambari.status.knox.genric: Unknown error. Server returned an unexpected response. Please check DataPlane logs for more information.
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.credential-not: There is no credential configured for Ambari default user. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.unauthorized: We were unable to authenticate the logged-in user with Knox on HDP cluster. Please verify that Knox has been setup and configured correctly for DataPlane. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.forbidden: We were unable to authenticate the logged-in user with Knox on HDP cluster. Please verify that Knox has been setup and configured correctly for DataPlane. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.not-found: We were unable to find the endpoint you were querying.
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.server-error: An internal server error occurred. Please check DataPlane logs for more information.
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.connection-ref: Connection to remote address was refused. Please check if Ambari is up and reachable from DataPlane host. Learn More
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.tls-error: TLS error. Please ensure your Ambari server has been configured with a correct keystore. If you are using self-signed certificates, you would need to get it added to Dataplane truststore.
error.cluster.ambari.status.raw.generic: Unknown error while communicating with Ambari. Please check DataPlane logs for more information.
error.cluster.ambari.status.generic: Generic error while communicating to Ambari. Please check DataPlane logs for more information.
error.core.ambari.status.already-added: This Ambari cluster has already been added.
error.database.generic: An unexpected error occurred with database. Please check DataPlane logs for more information.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please check DataPlane logs for more information.

cluster.connection-refused.reasons.enable.knox.access: If you are using a Knox Gateway, confirm your DataPlane environment has network access to the Gateway, and that you enabled the Knox Gateway checkbox option.
cluster.connection-refused.reasons.enable.network.access: If you are not using a Knox Gateway, confirm your DataPlane environment has network access to Ambari.
cluster.connection-refused.reasons.upload.certificate: If you are using a self-signed certificate, disable certificate validation, or upload your certificate to DataPlane (available under Admin > Settings).
